refsect1.title: Tool description
refsect1.para: Used to contact delegation service and store a delegated credential. A delegated credential is created, stored in a delegation service and the Endpoint Referecne(EPR) of the credetial is written out to a file for further use.

entry.para: Host on which delegation factory service is running. Defaults to localhost
Port on which delegation factory service is running. Defaults to 8080
Filename to read credential from. If not speecified, default proxy location is used.
Lifetime for the created delegated credentials, specified in seconds. Defaults to 12 hours.
If set to "true", full delegation is done, if set to "false" limited delegation is done. Defaults to limited delegation.
Sets the security mechanism type. If set to 'msg' Secure Message is used, if set to 'conv' Secure Conversation is used or if set to 'trans' Secure Transport is used. Defaults to Secure Transport.
Sets the protection type. If set to 'sig' siganture is used, if set to 'enc' encryption is used. Defaults to signature.

Type of client authorization to use. If set to "none" no authorization is done, "host" host authorization is done, "self" self authorization is done else the string specified is used as expected identity. Defaults to host authorization.
Filename to write out EPR of delegated credential

refsect1.title: Tool description
refsect1.para: Used to refresh delegated credentials pointed to be specified EPR. A new credential is generated and the one the delegation service is overwritten.

entry.para: Filename to read credential from. If not speecified, default proxy location is used.
Lifetime for the created delegated credentials, specified in seconds. Defaults to 12 hours.
If set to "true", full delegation is done, if set to "false" limited delegation is done. Defaults to limited delegation.
Sets the security mechanism type. If set to 'msg' Secure Message is used, if set to 'conv' Secure Conversation is used or if set to 'trans' Secure Transport is used. Defaults to Secure Transport.
Sets the protection type. If set to 'sig' siganture is used, if set to 'enc' encryption is used. Defaults to signature.

Type of client authorization to use. If set to "none" no authorization is done, "host" host authorization is done, "self" self authorization is done else the string specified is used as expected identity. Defaults to host authorization.
Filename to read EPR of delegated credential from. Defaults to "delegatedCredEPR"
